workout:
Here's a simple yet effective bodyweight workout with three exercises:

1. Squats
   - Stand tall with your feet hip-width apart.
   - Keeping your weight in your heels, sit back as if you're sitting into an imaginary chair.
   - Keep your knees from extending past your toes and maintain proper form throughout the movement.
   - Complete 3 sets of 15-20 repetitions.

2. Push-ups
   - Start in a high plank position with your hands directly under your shoulders, body in a straight line from head to heels.
   - Keeping your elbows tucked close to your sides, lower your chest towards the ground.
   - Push back up to the starting position.
   - Modify this exercise by performing them on your knees if needed. Complete 3 sets of 10-15 repetitions.

3. Plank
   - Begin in a high plank position as described above.
   - Engage your core and keep your body in a straight line, maintaining proper form throughout the hold.
   - Hold for 20-60 seconds, then rest briefly before repeating.
   - Complete 3 sets with gradually increasing hold times.

Workout Title: 🏋️‍♂️💪 Band Blast Full Body (20 min) - Active Rest Between Sets! 🕒🚀

Warm-up:
- Jumping Jacks: 2 min
- Arm Circles (Forward & Backward): 30 sec each

Workout:

1. Band Pull-aparts 👇🏻‍♂️➡️👇🏻‍♂️
   - Sets: 4
   - Reps: 15-20
   - Rest: 30 sec

2. Bent-over Reverse Fly 💪🌈
   - Sets: 4
   - Reps: 12-15
   - Rest: 30 sec

3. Glute Bridge to Hamstring Curls 🍑🔝
   - Sets: 3
   - Reps: 15-20 each leg
   - Rest: 45 sec

4. Step-ups (alternating legs) + Banded Knee Lift 🏃‍♂️↕️
   - Sets: 3
   - Reps: 10 each leg
   - Rest: 30 sec

5. Banded Push-ups 💥💪
   - Sets: 4
   - Reps: 10-12
   - Rest: 30 sec

6. Squat Jumps + Banded Squats 🏋️‍♂️↕️
   - Sets: 3
   - Reps:
     - Squat Jumps: 15-20
     - Banded Squats: 12-15
   - Rest: 45 sec

Cool-down:
- Downward Dog to Cobra (flow): 1 min each
- Pigeon Pose (each side): 30 sec each

Muscle Groups Worked & Percentage:

- Upper Body Push: 20% (Banded Push-ups)
- Upper Body Pull: 25% (Band Pull-aparts, Bent-over Reverse Fly)
- Lower Body Push: 30% (Step-ups + Banded Knee Lift, Squat Jumps + Banded Squats)
- Lower Body Pull: 10% (Glute Bridge to Hamstring Curls)
- Core: 15%

Total: 💯

Workout of the Day 🏋️‍♂️

*Warm-up:*
- Jumping Jacks ❌ 2 min

*Round 1:*

1. Resistance Band Pull-aparts 🔄 15 reps
   - Rest: 30 sec

2. Squats with resistance band around thighs ✋ 15 reps
   - Rest: 30 sec

3. Resistance Band Bicep Curls ⤵️ 12 reps (each arm)
   - Rest: 30 sec

4. Push-ups 👨‍❌‍💼 10 reps
   - Rest: 60 sec

*Repeat Round 1 for a total of 3 rounds.*

Cool-down:
- Plank 🕰️ 30 sec

Muscle Groups Worked & Percentage:

- Upper Body: 55%
  - Chest, Shoulders, Arms
- Lower Body: 25%
  - Legs, Glutes
- Core: 10%
- Full Body: 10%

Workout Name: 🏋️‍♂️💥 Jump & Tone Circuit 💥

Warm Up (3 min):
- Jumping Jacks: 2 min
- High Knees: 30 sec
- Arm Circles: 30 sec forward and backward each

Circuit (12 min) - Repeat for 4 rounds:

1. Jump Rope: 🏋️‍♀️🔥 2 min (60 jumps)
   - *Rest:* 30 sec
2. Resistance Band Bicep Curls: 💪🏻 15 reps
   - *Rest:* 15 sec
3. Burpees: 🏋️‍♂️💨 10 reps
   - *Rest:* 30 sec
4. Resistance Band Overhead Press: 🤯💪🏽 15 reps
   - *Rest:* 15 sec
5. Mountain Climbers: 🏋️‍♀️⚡ 30 sec (each leg)
   - *Rest:* 30 sec

Cool Down (3 min):
- Plank: 💪🏿🕰 Hold for 1 min
- Glute Bridges: 🍑💪🏼 2 sets of 15 reps
- Seated Forward Fold: 🧘‍♀️🧠 Hold for 30 sec

Summary:
This workout targets the following muscle groups and percentages:

- Cardiovascular system (Jump Rope, Burpees, Mountain Climbers): 45%
- Upper body (Resistance Band Bicep Curls, Resistance Band Overhead Press): 27.5%
- Core (Plank) & Glutes (Glute Bridges): 17.5%
- Flexibility (Seated Forward Fold): 10%
